name: Alejandro Castaño Trio
bio: Alejandro Castaño  is an active performer and educator in the United States and abroad. Castaño’s performance and recording credits include: Ron Miles, Eric Gunnison, Greg Gisbert, Peter Sommer, Steve Turre, Benny Bannack III, Gabriel Mervine and many others. He received his Bachelors in Jazz Studies from Metropolitan University of Denver in 2015. He is an educator at Denver School of the Arts, teaching percussion and Jazz, as well as an educator for the Colorado Conservatory of the Jazz Arts.

charity.name: Colorado Conservatory for the Jazz Arts
bio: The Colorado Conservatory for the Jazz Arts is a unique 501-(c)(3) non-profit organization dedicated to empowering youth to creatively express themselves through the language of jazz. CCJA gives young musicians life-changing musical experiences through mentorship by the region’s most sought-after professional jazz musicians. Our students experience personal and artistic grown through participation in small ensembles, big bands, vocal ensembles, jazz instruction camps, jam sessions, clinics, community performances, and much more.
